## Vector3.rotate() method

Rotates the current Vector3 based on the given quaternion

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rotate(q: Quaternion): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  q | <code>Quaternion</code> | defines the Quaternion |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the current Vector3
